original_text: So Joshua took the whole land, according to all that the Lord said unto Moses; and Joshua gave it for an inheritance unto Israel according to their divisions by their tribes. And the land rested from war.
korean_text: 이와 같이 여호수아가 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하신 대로 그 온 땅을 점령하여 이스라엘 지파의 구분에 따라 기업으로 주매 그 땅에 전쟁이 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: So Joshua took the whole land
according to all that the Lord said unto Moses
and Joshua gave it for an inheritance unto Israel
according to their divisions by their tribes
And the land rested from war
